TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageFunctionBase extends System.Windows.Controls.Page

Docs.summary: An abstract base class that is the parent of all page function classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunctionBase"> type.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the page function should not be added to navigation history.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> that indicates whether a page function should not be added to navigation history. The default value is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601.OnReturn%2A> must be called for RemoveFromJournal to be applied.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Start() cil managed

Docs.summary: Override this method to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601> when it is navigated to for the first time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is only called on the initial navigation. It is not called if a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601> is later reactivated.
